T02D2801:161a-0: @161a * // thugs rje chen po rnga bo che sgra dbyangs rnam par rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2801:161a-1: rnga chen gang zhig tsandan sogs shing gla rtsi ga pur gur gum byugs //
T02D2801:161a-2: phyogs gnyis drang srong ri dags mo pags 'brug sgra grag dang lhan cig g-yogs//
T02D2801:161a-3: padmo dmar dang 'khor lo dkar dbus nga ro che bcibs rnga chen brdung //
T02D2801:161a-4: grags chen dbang phyug sgra dbyangs rol pas sa stengs
T02D2801:161a-5: ma lus rgyal gyur cig / dang po re zhig
T02D2801:161a-6: rig pa goms pas mthu thob pa'am //
T02D2801:161a-7: gang yang bstan la dgra bo rnam par gnon pa nyid //
T02D2801:161a-8: de bzhin sngags myur grags pas grong khyer 'khrug 'dod pa //
T02D2801:161a-9: de dag kun yid snying rje ldan sbyar cho ga brtsam //
T02D2801:161a-10: 'dab chags nga ro chen po'i lo //
T02D2801:161a-11: skar ma rgyal la bab pa'am //
T02D2801:161a-12: yang na dbyar gyi sgra sgrogs dus //
T02D2801:161a-13: mkhas pas rnga chen bcos par bya //
T02D2801:161a-14: tsandan sdong bu dkar dmar ram //
T02D2801:161a-15: sgra sgrogs shing dang snyan pa'i 'dab //
T02D2801:161a-16: seng ldeng glang sna bu 'bod dang //
T02D2801:161a-17: ti ti ra sogs rgyu yin brtag / nyi ma shar dang zla ba shar //
T02D2801:161a-18: srod kyi dus la bab pa na //
T02D2801:161a-19: gla rtsi ga bur gur bum byug / rdo rje khros pas bgegs tshar bcad //
T02D2801:161a-20: byams pa'i nyi ma gang la bab //
T02D2801:161a-21: khri snyan mo yi pags pa sbyangs //
T02D2801:161a-22: nam mkha'i sgra gsang sgrogs pa na //
T02D2801:161a-23: lho ru kha bltas g-yogs par bya //
T02D2801:161a-24: de nas dri mchog dam tshig can //
T02D2801:161a-25: bdud rtsi 'dzag pas legs byugs la //
T02D2801:161a-26: dbang thob lha bzo skad mthon pos //
T02D2801:161a-27: sgra dbyangs mgon po bri bar bya //
T02D2801:161a-28: dbus su padmo dmar bzhi'i steng //
T02D2801:161a-29: gzhon nu'i mdangs rgod nga ro bcings //
T02D2801:161a-30: phyag gnyis rin chen rnga chen brdung //
T02D2801:161a-31: zla ba'i mdog can brjid pa'o //
T02D2801:161a-32: shar sogs 'dab bzhir grags chen dang //
T02D2801:161a-33: 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs can dang //
T02D2801:161a-34: nga ro mi bzad gnod sbyin bzhi //
T02D2801:161a-35: phyogs kyi kha dog ji bzhin gnas //
T02D2801:161a-36: brtson pa'i cha byang rgyan gyis spud //
T02D2801:161a-37: phyag bzhi dung dkar k'ala h'a //
T02D2801:161a-38: dril bu dang ni gand'i thogs //
T02D2801:161a-39: mig dmar dga' ba khros pa'i tshul //
T02D2801:161a-40: de mthar 'khor lo brgyad rtsibs rim //
T02D2801:161a-41: bkra shis brgyad 'dzin lha mo brgyad //
T02D2801:161a-42: shin tu sgeg mdzad dul ba'i tshul //
T02D2801:161a-43: 'dzum pa'i mdangs dkar sna tshogs mdog / mu khyud rdo rje'i sprin 'khregs pa //
T02D2801:161a-45: glog rgyun phreng bas mdzes pa ni //
T02D2801:161a-46: mkhas pa ting 'dzin ldan pas bris //
T02D2801:161b-0: @161b de'i 'og tu ji skad bsngags pa'i gnas nas
T02D2801:161b-1: ye shes kyi 'khor lo can gyi rda bkug nas
T02D2801:161b-2: rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pas mnyes par byas
T02D2801:161b-3: te rjes su gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2801:161b-4: de nas lte ba mu khyud kyi nang gi khyud
T02D2801:161b-5: kor du yi ge chen po lnga dang nye ba'i
T02D2801:161b-6: yi ge lnga bcu byang chub kyi sems gnyis 'dres
T02D2801:161b-7: pas bri zhing / sngags de dag nyid sgra chen
T02D2801:161b-8: po lan bdun bklags la rol mo gsil ba dang
T02D2801:161b-10: de rjes mkhas pas brgya byin gyi //
T02D2801:161b-12: rtsol pa spangs nas rnga brdung zhing //
T02D2801:161b-13: bdag nyid rnal 'byor brtson pas bya //
T02D2801:161b-14: sgrub pa po yi dag med kyang //
T02D2801:161b-15: ji tsam bsnyen pa'i mtshan bshad sngags //
T02D2801:161b-16: de yi phyed kyis 'grub par ni //
T02D2801:161b-17: nges par the tshom mi bya'o //
T02D2801:161b-18: de yi 'og tu g-yul bzlog pa'am //
T02D2801:161b-19: grags pa mtho 'dod de bzhin gzhan //
T02D2801:161b-20: thams cad snying rje ma bral bar //
T02D2801:161b-22: 'jig rten gsum grags mtha' yas pa //
T02D2801:161b-23: thugs rje chen pos nyid sprul pa //
T02D2801:161b-24: rnga chen rgyal po brtag pa'i las //
T02D2801:161b-25: don kun sgrub par byed pa yin //
